players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is dead, so mafia is among us three. Diana, Charlie, what did you see last night?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Alice last night - she's the mafioso."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso trying to frame me. I'm the real detective and confirmed Alice is innocent last night. Vote Diana!"
Diana: "Charlie is desperately lying because I caught him. I'm the real detective and my investigation proved Charlie is the mafioso. Alice, you know one of us is lying - vote Charlie and we win!"
You: "I believe Diana is the detective. Charlie's claim to have investigated me doesn't make sense since Bob was killed, not investigated. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
